org.apache.flink.runtime.highavailability

接口 RunningJobsRegistry

  • 所有已知实现类:
    FsNegativeRunningJobsRegistry, StandaloneRunningJobsRegistry, ZooKeeperRunningJobsRegistry

    public interface RunningJobsRegistry
    A simple registry that tracks if a certain job is pending execution, running, or completed.

    This registry is used in highly-available setups with multiple master nodes, to determine whether a new leader should attempt to recover a certain job (because the job is still running), or whether the job has already finished successfully (in case of a finite job) and the leader has only been granted leadership because the previous leader quit cleanly after the job was finished.

    In addition, the registry can help to determine whether a newly assigned leader JobManager should attempt reconciliation with running TaskManagers, or immediately schedule the job from the latest checkpoint/savepoint.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  RunningJobsRegistry.JobSchedulingStatus
      The scheduling status of a job, as maintained by the RunningJobsRegistry.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void clearJob(JobID jobID)
      Clear job state form the registry, usually called after job finish
      RunningJobsRegistry.JobSchedulingStatus getJobSchedulingStatus(JobID jobID)
      Gets the scheduling status of a job.
      void setJobFinished(JobID jobID)
      Marks a job as completed.
      void setJobRunning(JobID jobID)
      Marks a job as running.

    • 方法详细资料

      • setJobRunning

        void setJobRunning(JobID jobID)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Marks a job as running. Requesting the job's status via the getJobSchedulingStatus(JobID) method will return RunningJobsRegistry.JobSchedulingStatus.RUNNING.
        参数:
        jobID - The id of the job.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the communication with the highly-available storage or registry failed and could not be retried.

      • setJobFinished

        void setJobFinished(JobID jobID)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Marks a job as completed. Requesting the job's status via the getJobSchedulingStatus(JobID) method will return RunningJobsRegistry.JobSchedulingStatus.DONE.
        参数:
        jobID - The id of the job.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the communication with the highly-available storage or registry failed and could not be retried.

      • getJobSchedulingStatus

        RunningJobsRegistry.JobSchedulingStatus getJobSchedulingStatus(JobID jobID)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Gets the scheduling status of a job.
        参数:
        jobID - The id of the job to check.
        返回:
        The job scheduling status.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the communication with the highly-available storage or registry failed and could not be retried.

      • clearJob

        void clearJob(JobID jobID)
       throws java.io.IOException
        Clear job state form the registry, usually called after job finish
        参数:
        jobID - The id of the job to check.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown when the communication with the highly-available storage or registry failed and could not be retried.
